item.content:encoded: Image: Square Enix via Polygon I can‚Äôt believe the developers went there The only thing more evil than Sephiroth is pitting Tifa Lockhart and Aerith Gainsborough against each other. Ever since the original Final Fantasy 7 came out in 1997, fans have debated which character Cloud should date. There‚Äôs Tifa, the childhood friend with a warm smile, or Aerith, a bright vision of hope for a dying world. item.title: 600 Activision QA workers unionize, Microsoft voluntarily recognizes | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Emanuele Cremaschi/Getty Images This will be the largest video game union in the country yet Hundreds of Activision quality assurance workers are unionizing with the Communications Workers of...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Emanuele Cremaschi/Getty Images This will be the largest video game union in the country yet Hundreds of Activision quality assurance workers are unionizing with the Communications Workers of America (CWA). The union covers approximately 600 Activision central QA workers across three locations: Austin, Texas; Eden Prairie, Minn.; and El Segundo, Calif. This makes the union, called Activision Quality Assurance United - CWA, the largest group of unionized video game workers in the U.S. Th...

item.title: Health-specific embedding tools for dermatology and pathology | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Dave Steiner, Clinical Research Scientist, Google Health, and Rory Pilgrim, Product Manager Google Research There‚Äôs a worldwide shortage of access to medical imaging expert interpretatio...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Dave Steiner, Clinical Research Scientist, Google Health, and Rory Pilgrim, Product Manager Google Research There‚Äôs a worldwide shortage of access to medical imaging expert interpretation across specialties including radiology, dermatology and pathology. Machine learning (ML) technology can help ease this burden by powering tools that enable doctors to interpret these images more accurately and efficiently. However, the development and implementation of such ML tools are often limi...

item.content:encoded: Image: Rare/Xbox Game Studios Rare‚Äôs pirate sandbox stands triumphant After Skull and Bones failed to scratch my pirate itch, I recently returned to an old, familiar friend. Sea of Thieves is sailing into a new year, with a new slate of content planned. Rare has experimented with how to update and enhance the pirate sandbox game since its launch in 2018. The game has also left the Microsoft ecosystem and will be available to PlayStation players in April ‚Äî which, of course, means there are a lo...

item.title: At $229, the Meta Quest 2 VR headset is a steal | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Meta This wire-free headset offers plenty of fun games and apps Virtual reality can be an expensive hobby, but it doesn‚Äôt have to be. For many gamers and folks who want to get into VR fitness...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Meta This wire-free headset offers plenty of fun games and apps Virtual reality can be an expensive hobby, but it doesn‚Äôt have to be. For many gamers and folks who want to get into VR fitness, the Meta Quest 2 headset is the best place to start. It has an established library of games and apps, including a stellar VR remake of Resident Evil 4, Beat Saber, Supernatural, Headspace‚Äôs new meditation app, the most immersive version of Tetris Effect you could ever hope to experience, along wit...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: Polygon | Images: Valve, Warner Bros. Indie devs are being told that their games will be ‚Äòretired‚Äô from Steam and console stores Warner Bros. Discovery is telling developers it plans to start ‚Äúretiring‚Äù games published by its Adult Swim Games label, game makers who worked with the publisher tell Polygon. At least three games are under threat of being removed from Steam and other digital stores, with the fate of other games published by Adult Swim unclear. The media conglomerate‚Äôs plan...

item.content:encoded: Image: Fantasy Flight Games Here‚Äôs where you can find cards and the many accessories made for the new Star Wars TCG Star Wars: Unlimited, the highly anticipated Star Wars TCG from Fantasy Flight, has arrived online and at your local games store. item.title: WTF is Regularization and What is it For? | KDnuggets
item.description: This article explains the concept of regularization and its significance in machine learning and deep learning. We have discussed how regularization can be used to enhance the performance of linear mo...
item.content:encoded: This article explains the concept of regularization and its significance in machine learning and deep learning. We have discussed how regularization can be used to enhance the performance of linear models, as well as how it can be applied to improve the performance of deep learning models.

item.title: Social learning: Collaborative learning with large language models | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Amirkeivan Mohtashami, Research Intern, and Florian Hartmann, Software Engineer, Google Research Large language models (LLMs) have significantly improved the state of the art for solving...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Amirkeivan Mohtashami, Research Intern, and Florian Hartmann, Software Engineer, Google Research Large language models (LLMs) have significantly improved the state of the art for solving tasks specified using natural language, often reaching performance close to that of people. As these models increasingly enable assistive agents, it could be beneficial for them to learn effectively from each other, much like people do in social settings, which would allow LLM-based agents to impro...

So much time, in fact, that progress in the field of ML is hampered by a fundamental obstacle: the wide variety of da...
